ModMetaData.name: Roo's Faun Xenotype
ModMetaData.author: Rooboid, Zelan
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a new, forest-dwelling xenotype to Rimworld: the fauns. Their reclusive and skittish natures make them a rare sight on the Rim, but their gifted connection with nature makes them excellent additions to any colony.
<size=25>• Features</size>
• 7 new genes that make up the Faun xenotype. • 30+ Faun backstories to go with various new pawn types. • 2 new abilities. • And more!
<size=25>• For More…</size>
If you’re looking for more features, check out Roo’s Satyr and Faun Xenotypes Expanded, which fleshes out the two xenotypes with factions, apparel, hairstyles and other goodies. For more information on mod compatibilities, bugs or plans for the future, please visit my steam workshop page or receive behind-the-scenes updates on my patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Rooboid
<size=25>• Credits</size>
All credits can be found in the mod's 'About' folder. A special thanks to my patrons for making this mod possible and keeping me sane: Britton McGrane, Brandon Pollastri, Eric Celmer, Johnsilker, دانيال أيفان مولار مارتينز, Clement C, Alexandra Milan, John Hamilton, Lau Rosenkilde Birk, Thomas, Shaelyn Rivers-Green, SpaceMarines1, Daedalus, Greg Bunger, D-Train, Dodo, Prince Gerald S and Bardest
